title: ICE: cannot convert `RePlaceholder` to a region vid

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

labels.name: AsyncAwait-Triaged
labels.description: Async-await issues that have been triaged during a working group meeting.

body:
Hello, I am getting an ICE while "playing" with [`unboxed_closure`](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/29625) ### Code MCVE can be found here: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76168#issuecomment-683910817
Original ```Rust #![feature(unboxed_closures)] use futures::executor::block_on; use std::future::Future; async fn walk(mut filter: F) where for<'a> F: FnMut<(&'a u32,)> + 'a, for<'a> >::Output: Future + 'a, { let res = filter(&5u32).await; println!("res: {}", res); } fn main() { block_on(async { walk(|&i| async move { true }).await }); } ```
### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: (from Playground) ``` rustc 1.48.0-nightly (d006f5734 2020-08-28) running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: src/librustc_mir/borrow_check/universal_regions.rs:768:36: cannot convert `RePlaceholder(Placeholder { universe: U5, name: BrNamed(DefId(0:8 ~ playground[a09e]::walk[0]::'a[1]), 'a) })` to a region vid thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:918:9 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', src/librustc_errors/lib.rs:918:9 stack backtrace: 0: std::panicking::begin_panic 1: rustc_errors::HandlerInner::bug 2: rustc_errors::Handler::bug 3: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt::{{closure}} 4: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt::{{closure}} 5: rustc_middle::ty::context::tls::with_opt 6: rustc_middle::util::bug::opt_span_bug_fmt 7: rustc_middle::util::bug::bug_fmt 8: rustc_mir::borrow_check::universal_regions::UniversalRegionIndices::to_region_vid::{{closure}} 9: rustc_mir::borrow_check::universal_regions::UniversalRegionIndices::to_region_vid 10: rustc_mir::borrow_check::region_infer::RegionInferenceContext::eval_verify_bound 11: rustc_mir::borrow_check::region_infer::RegionInferenceContext::eval_verify_bound 12: rustc_mir::borrow_check::region_infer::RegionInferenceContext::solve 13: rustc_mir::borrow_check::nll::compute_regions 14: rustc_mir::borrow_check::do_mir_borrowck 15: rustc_infer::infer::InferCtxtBuilder::enter 16: rustc_mir::borrow_check::mir_borrowck 17: core::ops::function::FnOnce::call_once 18: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::mir_borrowck>::compute 19: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 20: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 21: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 22: rustc_typeck::collect::type_of::type_of 23: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 24: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 25: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 26: rustc_middle::ty::util::OpaqueTypeExpander::expand_opaque_ty 27: rustc_middle::ty::util::::try_expand_impl_trait_type 28: rustc_typeck::check::check_item_type 29: rustc_middle::hir::map::Map::visit_item_likes_in_module 30: rustc_typeck::check::check_mod_item_types 31: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::check_mod_item_types>::compute 32: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 33: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 34: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 35: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_query_impl 36: rustc_session::utils::::time 37: rustc_typeck::check_crate 38: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 39: rustc_middle::ty::query:: for rustc_middle::ty::query::queries::analysis>::compute 40: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task_impl 41: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 42: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query_impl 43: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 44: rustc_span::with_source_map 45: rustc_interface::interface::create_compiler_and_run 46: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set note: Some details are omitted, run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=full` for a verbose backtrace. ```
